humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the tumor size as 3 x 2.7 x 2 cm. According to the rules, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. This tumor size falls within the T2 category, so the pathologic T stage is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that the tumor size is 3 x 2.7 x 2 cm. According to the TNM staging system for cancer, T1 is up to 2 cm, T2 is between 2 and 5 cm, T3 is more than 5 cm, and T4 is any size with direct extension to the chest wall or skin. Since the tumor size is 3 cm, which falls in the range of 2-5 cm, the T stage is T2.
